book.title: So Mote It Be!
book.author: Christian Bernard
book.discription: This collection of writings explore topics dear to Rosicrucian hearts: the power of universal love, the heritage of the Rose-Croix, life and death, the obscure night, reincarnation, initiation, and much more. Readers will better understand and benefit from the ancient wisdom found in the Rosicrucian tradition.
